content: I am aware of an issue with the website and am working on it now.
The website is back online. However, the conference call center portion of the application is not available. More to come.
I am very sorry to say the problem is not fixed and the server is back to being unavailable. Still working on it.

I am still not ready to say that the problem is fixed, but am happy to report that the website is up. I am continuing to work through conference call site problems but do not believe any more downtime will be necessary.
There are known issues with LOGIN and ACCOUNT CREATION on hl7.org.
We have had a firewall go out on us and are replacing it now.
Estimated downtime of just LOGIN and ACCOUNT CREATION is 2 hours.
Login and Account Creation are available. The firewall has been replaced.
